title: Classic White Wedding
long_description: Experience the enchantment of an elegant winter wonderland wedding. With glistening snow, cozy fires, and warm embraces.

title: Rustic Barn Wedding
long_description: Embrace the beauty of nature with a bohemian beachfront wedding. Feel the sand beneath your feet, listen to the soothing waves.

title: Beachfront Wedding Extravaganza
long_description: Step into a bygone era with a vintage garden wedding. Surrounded by lush blooms and timeless elegance.

title: Vintage Garden Wedding
long_description: Escape to the tranquil beauty of the mountains for a rustic retreat wedding. Exchange vows amidst towering trees.
